translation.en: [man over radio] Jane, go do your rounds. I'll come down and cover the desk.
translation.de: Jane, mach deine Runden. Ich übernehme den Schreibtisch.

translation.en: [woman] On my way.
[man] This is Detective Wade Rollins with the Portland PD.
translation.de: Detective Wade Rollins von der Polizei Portland.

translation.en: Leave your name and number, and I'll get back to you.
translation.de: Hinterlassen Sie Namen und Nummer, ich melde mich.

translation.en: Detective, uh… [sniffles] This is Andrea Bowen again.
translation.de: Detective, hier ist wieder Andrea Bowen.

translation.en: Sorry. Uh…
I know it's late, but could you call me back when you can?
translation.de: Ich weiß, es ist spät, aber rufen Sie mich zurück?

translation.en: I-- [shudders] I'd really appreciate it.
[shakily] I'm just really scared, and I just…
I feel like he's still watching me.
translation.de: Ich glaube, er beobachtet mich noch.

translation.en: [man] Andrea, this is how the world ends.
[sobbing] No.
-[tense, fast-paced music] -[yelling] No!
No, no, no! No!
Help!
No! No…
Help!
Help! Somebody! No!
No! Help!
-[music continues over speakers] -[woman] Hi, sorry. I had a bottle of wine, but I drank it,
translation.de: Hi. Ich hatte eine Flasche Wein, aber ich trank sie.

translation.en: so I brought you this plant, which I'm now noticing is dead.
translation.de: Ich brachte diese Pflanze, die tot ist.

translation.en: -I called you five times. -What's wrong?
Jenn, Brian's here.
I know, I'm sorry. It's just--
Originally, you weren't coming, and then Scott invited him,
translation.de: Du wolltest nicht kommen, und Scott lud ihn ein.

translation.en: and I had absolutely no idea. So…
Yeah, I could just… tell everyone you're not feeling well, you know?
translation.de: Ja, ich könnte allen sagen, dass es dir nicht gut geht.

translation.en: I think I need a glass of wine.
Hey, I am so sorry.
translation.de: Hey, es tut mir so leid.

translation.en: Yes, yes, he is.
-You don't have to apologize. -He does.
She told me a week ago that you weren't coming.
translation.de: Sie sagte mir, dass du nicht kommst.

translation.en: -It's her fault. -Okay. Stop.
You don't know what's happening, so walk away.
translation.de: Du weißt nicht, was los ist. Geh einfach.

translation.en: -Okay, that's really cute. -I love you. [chuckles]
[woman] Oh, it's Dr. Meade!
[chuckling] Hi. Dr. Meade.
This is Jenn. As in, "The Jenn."
-Yes. I'm "The Jenn," apparently. -[Meade] Ah!
-Collin Meade. Very nice to meet you. -[woman] He's magical. Changed my life.
translation.de: -Collin Meade. Freut mich. -Er ist magisch. Hat mein Leben verändert.

translation.en: I got the promotion, like, a month after working with you?
translation.de: Ich bekam die Beförderung nach einem Monat.

translation.en: And this house. You should totally go see him.
translation.de: Und dieses Haus. Du solltest zu ihm gehen.

translation.en: What? Everyone needs therapy.
-That's what you say, right? -You know where the ice tongs are?
-It's by the ice bucket, Scott. -[Scott] They're not there.
translation.de: -Beim Eiskübel, Scott. -Nein, sie ist nicht da.

translation.en: Babe. Seriously, every time! I put them beside the ice thing.
translation.de: Babe. Im Ernst, jedes Mal. Ich legte sie neben das Eis.

translation.en: It's not every time. [continues inaudibly]
Didn't know therapists could hang out with their clients.
translation.de: Therapeuten hängen mit ihren Kunden ab?

translation.en: I mean, I follow the rules 99% of the time.
Maybe 95?
It was nice meeting you.
-Cheers to your new house. -My new house!
translation.de: -Prost. -Auf euer neues Haus. Mein neues Haus!

translation.en: So, Brian, how's Foghorn?
What's Foghorn?
-It's a stupid name, is what it is. -No, what is it?
translation.de: -Es ist ein blöder Name. -Nein, was ist es?

translation.en: Uh, the guys created a new software for some big audio engineer.
translation.de: Die Jungs entwickelten eine neue Software für einen Toningenieur.

translation.en: I just helped write some of the code.
What about you, Jennifer?
Oh, sorry. What?
Oh, no. I was just, uh--
What do you do?
I'm just-- Um, I'm sort of in between jobs at the moment.
She's just being modest. Jenny is actually a killer software engineer.
translation.de: Sie ist nur bescheiden. Jenny ist Softwareentwicklerin.

translation.en: -Impressive. -[Jenn] Mm-hmm.
-So, you two ever worked together? -Brian!
Um… Is there sesame in that? [gasps] Oh my God! Brian, I'm so sorry.
translation.de: -Ist da Sesam drin? -Oh mein Gott! Brian, es tut mir so leid.

translation.en: [Brian] It's okay. It's okay.
Wow, that would've sucked if you died in our new house, dude.
translation.de: Wäre schlecht, wenn du in unserem neuen Haus stirbst.

translation.en: You know what? I think I'm gonna leave this right here.
translation.de: Weißt du, was? Ich glaube, ich lasse den hier.

translation.en: Just in case. [chuckles]
-[mouthing] You okay? -Yeah, I'm good.
translation.de: Alles ok? Ja, mir geht's gut.

translation.en: -Jennifer. -Hm. Yes?
I'm headed out, but, uh, I wanted to leave you this.
translation.de: Ich gehe, aber ich wollte Ihnen die geben.

translation.en: -In case you're interested. -Okay.
Good night.
You too.
Yeah. "Viola will be here in nine minutes."
translation.de: Ja. Viola kommt in neun Minuten.

translation.en: Thanks for saving my life.
Don't mention it.
Good night, Jenny.
Good night.
Yeah?
I have tried really hard not to bother you, but…
translation.de: Ich wollte dich nicht belästigen, aber…

translation.en: I think about you all the time, and I just--
translation.de: Ich denke ständig an dich und…

translation.en: I miss you.
I didn't ask you to stay away because you bother me.
translation.de: Du sollst nicht wegbleiben, weil du mich belästigst.

translation.en: Yeah. I know--
Then don't say things like that.
When you say things like that, you make me sound like the bad guy,
translation.de: Wenn du so was sagst, klinge ich wie die Böse,

translation.en: and I'm not the bad guy. I'm--
translation.de: und das bin ich nicht. Ich…

translation.en: You're not the bad guy. I'm not saying you are.
translation.de: Ich sage nicht, du wärst der Böse.

translation.en: I'm just-- Oh God, what am I saying? I don't know what I'm saying.
translation.de: Ich bin nur… Oh Gott! Was sage ich? Ich weiß nicht, was ich sage.

translation.en: Can I give you a ride home?
-I don't think that's a good id-- -[Brian] It's just a ride, Jenny.
translation.de: -Das ist keine gute Idee… -Es ist nur eine Fahrt, Jenny.

translation.en: [woman] You guys had sex?
-Do you plan on getting back together? -No.
I'm stupid. Oh God, I'm the most stupid.
translation.de: Ich bin dumm. Oh Gott, ich bin die Dümmste.

translation.en: Oh my gosh, you're not. You're not stupid. You're just-- You're--
translation.de: Oh Gott, du bist nicht dumm. Du bist nur… Du bist…

translation.en: -You're unhappy. -Yeah, everyone's unhappy.
No. I'm happy. Scott's happy.
translation.de: Nein. Ich bin glücklich. Scott ist glücklich.

translation.en: And for the most part, I hate to say this to you,
translation.de: Und ich hasse es, dir das zu sagen,

translation.en: but Brian is happy.
What am I supposed to say to that?
[clicks tongue] I think you should see Dr. Meade.
-Who's Dr. Meade? -My therapist.
-Gina, I'll never do that. -You met him. He's tall, handsome.
translation.de: -Nein. -Er war gestern da. Er sieht gut aus.

translation.en: -No. -Come on.
Hear me out, okay? You're isolating. You're unemployed.
translation.de: Hör mir zu, ok? Du isolierst dich. Du bist arbeitslos.

translation.en: Don't pretend like you're not.
And you slept with your ex-fiancé last night.
translation.de: Du hattest Sex mit deinem Ex-Verlobten.

translation.en: -Your life is a vortex of crap right now. -This is so much fun.
translation.de: -Dein Leben ist scheiße. -Das macht so viel Spaß.

translation.en: Can you just go for me, please?
translation.de: Tust du es einfach für mich?

translation.en: -Ugh, fine. Once. -Great!
I made you an appointment for Friday.
You should've seen me when I started with him.
translation.de: Sie hätten mich sehen sollen, als ich mit ihm anfing.

translation.en: Oh, sorry?
I pull my hair.
OCD.
Whatever you're here for, Dr. Meade will fix it.
translation.de: Wofür Sie auch hier sind, Dr. Meade kümmert sich darum.

translation.en: Yeah.
He's waiting for you.
Oh, okay. Um, yeah.
Wow, this is cozy.
[chuckles] Just feeding the little guy.
You know that having fish reduces stress and lowers blood pressure?
translation.de: Wussten Sie, dass Fische Stress reduzieren und den Blutdruck senken?

translation.en: [Jenn] No, I didn't.
At least that's what I've heard. Who knows if it's true.
translation.de: Das hörte ich. Wer weiß, ob es stimmt.

translation.en: But I do find them calming.
I'm so glad you decided to come in.
And here I am!
Please.
[Jenn] I don't feel motivated to do anything.
translation.de: Ich fühle mich zu nichts motiviert.

translation.en: Or, like, I should probably stop drinking. I should probably exercise more.
translation.de: Ich sollte aufhören zu trinken. Ich sollte mehr trainieren.

translation.en: I should probably get eight hours of sleep at night.
translation.de: Ich sollte nachts acht Stunden schlafen.

translation.en: Jennifer, um,
bad habits come from deeper issues.
translation.de: schlechte Angewohnheiten kommen von tieferen Problemen.

translation.en: There's always a root cause.
What might that be for you?
I don't know?
Was that a question?
Yes?
Tell me about you and Brian.
He's nice. He's sweet, he's funny, he's smart. It's Brian. I don't know.
translation.de: Er ist nett. Er ist süß, witzig, klug. Er ist Brian. Ich weiß nicht.

translation.en: [exhales] Okay. Fine. Um…
We met in college.
We lived together. We worked together. It was like a whole thing.
translation.de: Wir lebten und arbeiteten zusammen. Eine große Sache.

translation.en: I had a miscarriage.
Actually, I was six months along, so it was a stillbirth.
translation.de: Na ja, nach sechs Monaten ist es eine Totgeburt.

translation.en: His name was Daniel.
I got to spend 33 minutes with him.
Brian and I were engaged, and, uh,
translation.de: Brian und ich waren verlobt und…

translation.en: you know, we just couldn't really figure it out after that. So…
translation.de: Wir konnten danach nicht mehr weitermachen. Also…

translation.en: Do you have anything after this?
No.
Have you ever tried hypnotherapy?
translation.de: Haben Sie schon mal Hypnotherapie versucht?

translation.en: [chuckles] No. No, I have not.
Why the judgment?
I'm just not a giving-away-control person,
translation.de: Ich bin keine Person, die gerne die Kontrolle aufgibt,

translation.en: so it's a pass.
Sure. But here's the wonderful thing about hypnotherapy. All right?
translation.de: Klar. Aber hier ist das Schöne an Hypnotherapie. Ok?

translation.en: Only you can control your subconscious.
-[Jenn sighs] -So, you're in control the whole time.
translation.de: Sie haben also stets die Kontrolle.

translation.en: And it's an excellent tool for people who have suffered…
translation.de: Es ist ein ausgezeichnetes Werkzeug für Menschen, die ein Trauma

translation.en: trauma.
Worst case scenario, it'll stop you from further destroying your poor fingers.
translation.de: Im schlimmsten Fall werden Sie Ihre armen Finger nicht weiter zerstören.

translation.en: [sighs] I don't know.
I had a mentor,
and his name was, uh, Dr. Xavier Sullivan.
translation.de: Sein Name war Dr. Xavier Sullivan.

translation.en: He was a brilliant mind. He would say,
translation.de: Er hatte einen brillanten Verstand. Er sagte:

translation.en: "Prosaic methods are reserved for the unimaginative."
"One in search of lasting results dares to open the mind."
translation.de: Wer dauerhafte Ergebnisse will, wagt es, den Geist zu öffnen."

translation.en: -[Meade] Jennifer? -[Jenn exhales]
What do you want?
Just wanna be happy again, you know?
translation.de: Ich will nur wieder glücklich sein.

translation.en: Then let me help you.
I want you to concentrate on the light.
translation.de: Konzentrieren Sie sich auf das Licht.

translation.en: [Meade] Feel the weight of your body as it melts into the couch,
translation.de: Spüren Sie das Gewicht Ihres Körpers, während er in die Couch schmilzt,

translation.en: muscle by muscle.
Starting at the toes,
the arches of the feet.
[Meade] Calves. Thighs.
All the way up,
until you arrive at the top of your head.
translation.de: bis Sie ganz oben an Ihrem Kopf ankommen.

translation.en: Now,
I want you to find yourself
in a beautiful forest.
That was an hour?
It felt like three minutes.
How do you feel?
[sighs] I don't know. I don't really remember anything.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht. Ich erinnere mich an nichts.

translation.en: How'd I do?
I think you might be more open to suggestibility
translation.de: Sie sind wohl offener für Suggestionen,

translation.en: than you imagined.
[Jenn] That was bizarre.
They called me right after I left. I start in two weeks.
translation.de: Sie riefen mich an, als ich ging. Ich fange in zwei Wochen an.

translation.en: Are you gonna do some yoga with me, or you're just gonna lie there?
translation.de: Willst du Yoga mit mir machen oder nur rumliegen?

translation.en: This is Shavasana. It is yoga.
translation.de: Das ist Savasana. Es ist Yoga.

translation.en: How many sessions did you have with Dr. Meade?
translation.de: Wie viele Sitzungen hattest du mit Dr. Meade?

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe, um, once a week for about three months now.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht. Vielleicht einmal in der Woche seit drei Monaten.

translation.en: I've asked him to do hypnosis twice.
translation.de: Ich habe ihn zweimal um Hypnose gebeten.

translation.en: It's not fair. I wanna conquer all of my fears.
translation.de: Nicht fair. Ich will meine Ängste besiegen.

translation.en: It's a compliment. You've already conquered all your fears.
translation.de: Du hast deine Ängste schon besiegt.

translation.en: Hi, have you seen me and spiders? Didn't think so.
translation.de: Hast du mich mal mit Spinnen gesehen?

translation.en: I'm really proud of you.
[whispers] You're perfect.
-Hi. -[chuckling] Hi.
-You look fantastic as ever. -Oh, thanks. You too.
Haven't seen you in a couple of weeks. You're not, uh… you're not avoiding me?
translation.de: Ich sah Sie seit ein paar Wochen nicht. Meiden Sie mich?

translation.en: Oh, no. I've been meaning to schedule. It's just I've been busy--
translation.de: Nein. Ich wollte einen Termin machen. Ich war nur beschäftigt.

translation.en: -Sure. -Oh…
I got the job.
-What? Really? -Yeah, I did.
-I had no doubt. -You didn't think I could do it?
No. I never doubted you.
May I buy you a celebratory coffee?
translation.de: Darf ich Sie auf einen Kaffee einladen?

translation.en: Yeah, okay.
-Yeah? -Yeah.
I did yoga with Gina, and I meditated last night.
translation.de: Ich habe Yoga mit Gina gemacht und gestern Abend meditiert.

translation.en: Amazing.
It was three minutes, and I thought about my dead plants, but I did it.
translation.de: Drei Minuten, und ich dachte an meine toten Pflanzen, aber ich tat es.

translation.en: -Progress. Not perfection. -You can't say that.
You're one of those people that wakes up at 5:00 a.m.
translation.de: Sie sind einer, der um 5 Uhr aufsteht.

translation.en: -and you're perfect at everything. -Hardly.
And one of those who hangs out with his clients but is very private.
translation.de: Und Sie treffen Kunden nach der Arbeit, sind aber sehr privat.

translation.en: All right.
I'll play.
I'm 46. Only child. [clicks tongue]
Uh, I was married once to the love of my life, Amy.
translation.de: Ich war mal mit der Liebe meines Lebens verheiratet, Amy.

translation.en: We were happy, but she died.
translation.de: Wir waren glücklich, aber sie starb.

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
What do they say? "Wanna make God laugh, tell him your plans."
translation.de: "Willst du Gott zum Lachen bringen, sag ihm deine Pläne."

translation.en: But, Jennifer, the important thing to remember is that being a victim is a choice,
translation.de: Aber Jennifer, es ist eine Entscheidung, ein Opfer zu sein.

translation.en: and we can let our hardships define us,
consume us, or we can accept
the extraordinary abilities that we have in this life
translation.de: dass wir außergewöhnliche Fähigkeiten in diesem Leben haben,

translation.en: to create the outcome we choose.
-For ourselves. May I? -Mm.
translation.de: das wir uns wünschen. Darf ich?

translation.en: [chuckling] Eyelash.
-[smooth jazz continues over speakers] -Thank you.
All right, well, enough about me. Um…
So, last we spoke, you were struggling a bit with Brian.
translation.de: Sie hatten letztes Mal Probleme mit Brian.

translation.en: How's it going there?
I don't know. I have been avoiding him.
translation.de: Ich bin ihm aus dem Weg gegangen.

translation.en: When you see Brian, uh,
is it hard for you?
Yeah.
Have you considered telling him this?
translation.de: Wollten Sie ihm das mal sagen?

translation.en: And if you did?
He may be hurt because we still care about each other a lot.
translation.de: Er könnte verletzt sein, weil wir uns immer noch mögen.

translation.en: Let me suggest something, and you can take it or leave it,
translation.de: Ich mache Ihnen mal einen Vorschlag.

translation.en: but I think you'd be wise to take it. [chuckles]
translation.de: Ich denke, es wäre klug, ihn anzunehmen.

translation.en: Okay.
Invite Brian to your place for dinner tonight.
translation.de: Laden Sie Brian zum Abendessen ein.

translation.en: -No. -[Meade] Why not?
I can think of infinite reasons why not.
Trust me. You'll be on your turf. You can cook a good meal.
translation.de: Sie sind auf gewohntem Boden. Sie können kochen.

translation.en: Tell him you got some matters you need to discuss.
translation.de: Sagen Sie ihm, Sie wollen etwas besprechen.

translation.en: I think it'd be very good for you.
translation.de: Ich denke, es wäre gut für Sie.

translation.en: But not easy. I mean, I'm not saying that. But-- But good.
translation.de: Aber nicht einfach. Das behaupte ich nicht. Aber gut.

translation.en: 'Cause, Jennifer,
you don't have to be a victim anymore.
translation.de: Sie müssen kein Opfer mehr sein.

translation.en: [Brian] Hey, it's Brian. I got your message.
translation.de: Hier ist Brian. Ich bekam deine Nachricht.

translation.en: Yeah, uh, I'll be there.
Let me know if you want me to bring anything. See you soon.
translation.de: Sag Bescheid, ob ich was mitbringen soll. Bis bald.

translation.en: Hello?
Hey, hey, hey! [sniffles] Where's your pen?
translation.de: Hey! Brian. Wo ist dein Injektor?

translation.en: Where's your--
[Gina] Hey.
It was an accident, Jenn.
I mean, I almost killed him at our housewarming party.
translation.de: Ich tötete ihn fast auf der Einweihungsfeier.

translation.en: You're the one who caught it.
I can't remember anything.
-You're probably just in shock. -No, I'm not in shock.
translation.de: -Du stehst unter Schock. -Nein, tue ich nicht.

translation.en: I'm serious. I--
I remember being at the store.
And then I'm at home sitting at the table.
translation.de: Und dann saß ich zu Hause am Tisch.

translation.en: Come on. I'm gonna-- I'm gonna take you home.
translation.de: Komm schon. Ich… Ich bringe dich nach Hause.

translation.en: [Meade] How's Brian?
Sorry?
Brian. How is he?
He's the same.
-[Meade] How long has it been now? -Eight days.
Do you remember anything else from that night?
translation.de: Erinnern Sie sich an etwas aus der Nacht?

translation.en: Is there any way that I could be responsible
for what happened that night?
[Meade] Why do you ask?
Because I can't stop thinking about it.
The way it felt,
and the missing time.
It's like what we do here.
translation.de: So, wie wir es hier tun.

translation.en: [inhales] Do you remember what I told you the first time we discussed hypnosis?
translation.de: Wissen Sie, was ich sagte, als wir über Hypnose sprachen?

translation.en: That only you have the power, control over your subconscious.
translation.de: Dass nur Sie die Macht haben, die Kontrolle über Ihr Unterbewusstsein.

translation.en: -Yeah, but-- -[Meade] Jennifer, listen to me.
We all have these wounds,
and every time we let the world run us, those wounds fester.
translation.de: und wenn wir uns von der Welt führen lassen, eitern diese Wunden.

translation.en: But that's a choice based on some preconceived notion
translation.de: Aber diese Wahl basiert auf einer vorgefassten Vorstellung,

translation.en: that the world can even run us in the first place.
translation.de: dass die Welt uns überhaupt führen kann.

translation.en: It's ego.
Ego derived from fear.
translation.de: Das Ego kommt durch die Angst.

translation.en: You follow?
So, the work we're doing is designed to eliminate that fear,
translation.de: Die Arbeit, die wir machen, soll diese Angst beseitigen,

translation.en: but the moment you start to doubt our work,
translation.de: aber sobald Sie an unserer Arbeit zweifeln,

translation.en: fear wins.
Is that what you want?
To let fear win?
No.
So you need to trust me…
and keep doing the work.
Hello?
[Meade] Jennifer,
carry the fire.
[newswoman] This is a terrible turn of events,
as the family is reeling after losing their daughter,
translation.de: Die Familie ist nach dem Verlust ihrer Tochter erschüttert,

translation.en: and they still have no information from police.
translation.de: und sie haben noch keine Infos von der Polizei.

translation.en: [newsman] …and in Portland, there's an investigation
translation.de: und sie haben noch keine Infos von der Polizei. Und in Portland gibt es Ermittlungen zum Tod ihrer Tochter.

translation.en: into the death of their daughter.
translation.de: Und in Portland gibt es Ermittlungen zum Tod ihrer Tochter.

translation.en: She'd recently taken out a restraining order on her psychiatrist.
translation.de: Sie erwirkte eine Unterlassungsverfügung gegen ihren Psychiater.

translation.en: Of course, it's been a game-changer to the entire case
translation.de: Natürlich hat das den Fall komplett verändert,

translation.en: as the police are now looking towards finding out further information as what…
translation.de: da die Polizei nun weitere Informationen sucht…

translation.en: [newsman 2] The study into crimes while under hypnosis
translation.de: Die Ermittlung von Verbrechen unter Hypnose

translation.en: is new to the state criminal court.
There are currently board psychiatrists…
[sighs] I don't know, Jenn. It's just-- I get why you'd be concerned.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, Jenn. Ich verstehe deine Sorge.

translation.en: I mean, it's not exactly comforting news, but I just-- I don't see it.
translation.de: Es ist beunruhigend, aber ich glaube das nicht.

translation.en: No, look. It says here in the article,
"Bowen told her family she was experiencing missing time."
translation.de: "Bowen erzählte ihrer Familie, dass die Zeit weg war."

translation.en: That is what happened to me. It was after I had lunch with Dr. Meade,
translation.de: Das ist mir passiert. Nachdem ich Dr. Meade traf,

translation.en: where he suggested I had Brian over for dinner.
-It just feels like a big leap. -Look at the background check.
translation.de: -Es scheint weit hergeholt. -Sieh dir den Hintergrundcheck an.

translation.en: You ran a background check?
Yes. Look, the only address listed is his office.
translation.de: Ja. Die einzige Adresse ist sein Büro.

translation.en: There's no private residence, employers, or unpaid parking tickets.
translation.de: Kein Haus, keine Arbeitgeber, keine unbezahlten Strafzettel.

translation.en: The man is basically a ghost until six months ago
translation.de: Der Mann war ein Geist, bis jemand vor sechs Monaten

translation.en: when someone takes out a restraining order. This is his patient,
translation.de: eine Unterlassungsverfügung erwirkte. Das ist seine Patientin,

translation.en: and he is torturing her. Stalking.
Psychological abuse, emotional abuse.
Maybe she was crazy.
This woman was afraid for her life,
translation.de: Diese Frau hatte Angst um ihr Leben,

translation.en: and then three days after she files a restraining order,
translation.de: und drei Tage nach Erlass der Unterlassungsverfügung

translation.en: she's dead.
She had a heart attack.
What if there is something else going on?
translation.de: Was ist, wenn es noch was anderes war?

translation.en: -What if he did something to her? -Okay. This is where you lose me.
translation.de: -Was, wenn er ihr etwas antat? -Ok. Ich verstehe nicht.

translation.en: Therapists use hypnotherapy to help their patients quit smoking.
translation.de: Durch Hypnotherapie hören Patienten mit dem Rauchen auf.

translation.en: Not to hack into their brains and stop their heart.
translation.de: Dadurch wird nicht ihr Herz gestoppt.

translation.en: -This is not a thing. -Yes, it-- Look, I thought that too.
translation.de: -Das gibt es nicht. -Doch. Das dachte ich auch.

translation.en: In Sweden, a group of teenagers are hypnotized to deal drugs,
translation.de: In Schweden wird eine Gruppe von Teenagern

translation.en: and they experienced blackouts.
In Germany, Zebediah Cantor is hypnotized to rob banks, and he has missing time--
translation.de: In Deutschland wird Zebediah Cantor hypnotisiert, um Banken auszurauben.

translation.en: Okay, I get it.
And this is from that night with Brian.
translation.de: Und das ist von der Nacht mit Brian.

translation.en: He called me, Gina. Right before I blacked out.
translation.de: Er rief mich an, Gina. Kurz bevor meine Erinnerung aussetzte.

translation.en: I remember everything now.
translation.de: Ich erinnere mich jetzt an alles.

translation.en: I did it on purpose, Gina.
It-- But it wasn't me. It was, it was--
translation.de: Es war nicht wirklich ich. Es war…

translation.en: But I did do it.
And then I just sat there and watched.
translation.de: Und dann saß ich da und sah zu.

translation.en: I didn't do anything.
I didn't get help.
I didn't even move until I came out of it.
translation.de: Ich bewegte mich nicht, bis ich aufwachte.

translation.en: I'm not crazy. [exhales]
So, what do we do?
Hey.
Thank you so much for meeting with us, detective, on such short notice.
translation.de: Danke, dass Sie sich so kurzfristig mit uns treffen, Detective.

translation.en: -We really appreciate it. -What can I do for you?
translation.de: -Wir wissen das zu schätzen. -Wie kann ich helfen?

translation.en: We wanted to ask you some questions about a woman named Andrea Bowen.
translation.de: Wir wollten Ihnen Fragen zu einer Frau namens Andrea Bowen stellen.

translation.en: Six months ago, she filed a restraining order against Collin Meade.
translation.de: Sie erwirkte eine Unterlassungsverfügung gegen einen Collin Meade.

translation.en: I know the case. What's your question?
translation.de: Ich kenne den Fall. Was ist die Frage?

translation.en: Her family said that she died of a heart attack,
translation.de: Ihre Familie sagte, sie starb an einem Herzinfarkt,

translation.en: but then they wanted a broader investigation.
translation.de: aber dann wollten sie eine umfassende Ermittlung.

translation.en: Did that investigation ever happen?
Why are you asking?
Because Dr. Meade is our therapist.
translation.de: Weil Dr. Meade unser Therapeut ist.

translation.en: Something strange is happening.
Strange how?
I've been having
weird dreams. But they don't feel like dreams.
translation.de: seltsame Träume. Sie fühlen sich nicht wie Träume an.

translation.en: You've been practicing hypnosis with Dr. Meade, Miss Thompson?
translation.de: Sie praktizieren Hypnose mit Dr. Meade, Miss Tompson?

translation.en: Collin Meade was brought in for questioning a week after Bowen's death.
translation.de: Collin Meade wurde eine Woche nach Bowens Tod verhört.

translation.en: Got us nowhere.
I wanted to keep digging.
I got a warrant, obtained his patient records.
Didn't matter. Got shut down that day.
translation.de: War egal. Der Fall wurde eingestellt.

translation.en: Told I couldn't even finish going through what we had.
translation.de: Ich konnte nicht mal mit dem, was wir hatten, weitermachen.

translation.en: Why?
Meade was also practicing hypnosis with Andrea.
translation.de: Meade praktizierte auch Hypnose mit Andrea.

translation.en: It's funny. Cops using old witnesses sometimes.
translation.de: Die Polizei setzt sie manchmal bei Zeugen ein.

translation.en: Try and get them to remember things they may have seen. [clicks tongue]
translation.de: Damit sie sich vielleicht an Dinge erinnern.

translation.en: If it works,
it becomes evidence in court,
translation.de: gilt das als Beweis vor Gericht.

translation.en: but if you're a victim, claiming someone used hypnosis
translation.de: Aber wenn man ein Opfer ist und behauptet, jemand benutzte Hypnose mit böser Absicht,

translation.en: with ill intent, that kinda thing, they'll laugh you out of the room.
translation.de: jemand benutzte Hypnose mit böser Absicht, lachen sie einen aus.

translation.en: You don't think she died of a heart attack?
translation.de: Sie glauben nicht an einen Herzinfarkt?

translation.en: Oh my God!
[detective] And then there's this.
Incoming call came from a blocked number.
translation.de: Der Anruf kam von einer blockierten Nummer.

translation.en: -Her behavior changed when she answered. -That happened to me.
translation.de: -Ihr Verhalten änderte sich danach. -Wie bei mir.

translation.en: What is she doing?
You ever heard of "quiescence"?
No.
It's the body's reaction to extreme fear.
translation.de: Die Reaktion des Körpers auf extreme Angst.

translation.en: The body enters paralysis, heart rate increases,
breathing intensifies.
But if it goes on too long, you die.
Maybe, technically, she died of a heart attack,
but whatever she was seeing in the elevator is what caused it.
translation.de: aber was immer sie im Aufzug sah, war die Ursache.

translation.en: So, what do I think?
I think you should find yourselves a new therapist.
translation.de: Suchen Sie sich einen neuen Therapeuten.

translation.en: I'll talk to you later, okay?
Yeah.
He hypnotized me.
What?
When?
This week.
We talked about you, I--
It's just-- You were so worried that something happened with Brian,
translation.de: Du warst so besorgt, dass mit Brian etwas passiert,

translation.en: and then he just--
He said he was wrong before, and then he thought that it might help me.
translation.de: Er sagte, er hätte sich geirrt, und dann dachte er, es könnte mir helfen.

translation.en: It's okay, it's okay.
We'll do what Det. Rollins said. We'll stay away.
translation.de: Wir hören auf Rollins. Wir halten uns fern.

translation.en: We'll figure this out, okay?
Hey, Dr. Meade, it's Jennifer Thompson. We just saw each other,
translation.de: Hey, Dr. Meade, hier ist Jennifer Tompson. Wir sahen uns erst,

translation.en: but I was wondering if you had any last-minute appointments available.
translation.de: aber ich frage mich, ob Sie kurzfristige Termine haben.

translation.en: Call me back when you can. Bye.
Jennifer. Please, come in.
-I was thrilled to get your call. -Yeah, thanks for squeezing me in.
translation.de: -Ihr Anruf überraschte mich. -Danke, dass Sie mich sehen.

translation.en: Was there something in particular you wanted to talk about?
No. Not-- Nothing really, actually. It's just, um,
translation.de: Nein. Eigentlich nicht. Es ist nur

translation.en: a general anxiety.
Brian's not awake yet, and so that's hard.
translation.de: Brian ist noch nicht wach, das ist schwer.

translation.en: Yeah.
I thought just a bit of hypnosis might help?
translation.de: Ich dachte, etwas Hypnose könnte helfen?

translation.en: Of course.
Okay.
[Wade] Lillian Dorsey.
Date of death, 11/27/2019.
-[phone line trilling] -[Wade] I'm looking for Adrienne Dorsey.
translation.de: NOTFALLKONTAKT: TELEFON - SCHWESTER Ich suche Adrienne Dorsey. Hier ist Detective Wade Rollins.

translation.en: This is Detective Wade Rollins with the Portland PD.
translation.de: Ich suche Adrienne Dorsey. Hier ist Detective Wade Rollins.

translation.en: I was hoping I could ask you some questions regarding your sister.
translation.de: Ich will Ihnen ein paar Fragen zu Ihrer Schwester stellen.

translation.en: Date of death, June 15, 2018. Hypnosis. Andrea Bowen. Hypnosis.
translation.de: Todesdatum, 15. Juni 2018. Hypnose. Andrea Bowen. Hypnose.

translation.en: [Meade on recording] Was there something in particular you wanted to talk about?
[Jenn] I thought just a bit of hypnosis might help?
translation.de: Ich dachte, etwas Hypnose könnte helfen?

translation.en: [Meade] Of course.
[Meade] Jennifer?
-[Jenn] Yes? -[Meade] Are you under?
-[Jenn] Yes. -[Meade] Good.
I'm going to ask you some questions, and you're gonna tell me the truth.
translation.de: Ich stelle Ihnen ein paar Fragen, und Sie sagen mir die Wahrheit.

translation.en: Why did you really come see me today?
translation.de: Warum sind Sie heute wirklich hier?

translation.en: [Jenn] To record you.
[Meade] Are you recording me now?
[Jenn] Yes.
-[Meade] And why are you recording me? -[menacing music]
translation.de: Und warum nehmen Sie mich auf?

translation.en: [Jenn] Because I want to hear what happens during our sessions.
translation.de: Weil ich hören will, was während der Sitzungen passiert.

translation.en: -[Meade] Do you not trust me? -[Jenn] No.
Why not?
[Jenn] Because I know about Andrea Bowen.
translation.de: Weil ich von Andrea Bowen weiß.

translation.en: [Meade] Is this why you were at the police station this morning?
translation.de: Waren Sie deshalb heute bei der Polizei?

translation.en: [Jenn] Yes.
[Meade] You were with Gina.
I assume she knows everything you know.
-[Jenn] Yes. -[Meade] Yes.
Thank you for being honest, my love.
translation.de: Danke für die Ehrlichkeit, meine Liebe.

translation.en: -[Scott] Dude, what quarter is it? -[Gina] Tell him to not--
No, they are not up by seven, bro! [laughs]
translation.de: Nein, sie führen nicht mit Sieben!

translation.en: -I'm serious. Hang up. -I gotta go before she kills me.
translation.de: -Ich meine es ernst. Leg auf. -Ich muss los.

translation.en: -See? -No, it's Jenn!
Tell him I told him wassup! Keep me informed. Yeah, okay, peace.
translation.de: Sag ihm liebe Grüße! Halte mich auf dem Laufenden.

translation.en: Girl, I gotta call you back. I have buyers calling any minute.
translation.de: Ich rufe dich zurück. Ein Käufer ruft gleich an.

translation.en: -Gina. Gina, where are you? -I'm just in the car with Scott.
translation.de: -Gina. Gina, wo bist du? -Ich bin mit Scott im Auto.

translation.en: -[Scott] Hey, Jenny. -Where are you?
We just left the house.
Turn around and go back to the house.
-I'm coming to you. -What? Why?
Could you go back to the house? You need to go back, listen to me.
translation.de: Geh zurück zum Haus! Du musst zurück. Hör mir zu. Geh raus…

translation.en: -Gina, get-- -I'm sorry, you're cutting out. I can't--
translation.de: Du musst zurück. Hör mir zu. Geh raus… Ich verliere dich. Ich kann…

translation.en: This is them. I'll call you back.
translation.de: Das sind sie. Ich rufe zurück.

translation.en: No, Gina! He knows we were at the police station. He knows!
translation.de: Nein, Gina. Er weiß, dass wir auf dem Polizeirevier waren!

translation.en: Fucking shit!
This is Gina.
[Meade] Gina, it's Dr. Meade.
Sorry to bother you, but do you have a moment to chat?
translation.de: Haben Sie einen Moment zum Plaudern?

translation.en: I'm just in the car with Scott.
translation.de: Ich bin mit Scott im Auto.

translation.en: [Meade] Even better. Gina, this is how the world ends.
translation.de: Umso besser. Gina, so endet die Welt.

translation.en: What was that?
[quietly] Get it off of me.
What?
-[Scott] Gina. -[Gina shudders]
-Get what off? -Get it off. Please!
translation.de: Was denn? -Runter damit. Bitte. -Was? Da ist nichts.

translation.en: What? There's nothing there. Get what off?
-Get it off of me! Please! -Gina, relax. Gina!
[screaming] Get it off!
Gina, stop!
Get it off! Get it off!
-[truck horn blares] -[Scott] No!
Detective Rollins. What a pleasant surprise.
translation.de: Detective Rollins. Was für eine nette Überraschung.

translation.en: Care for a scotch?
Gina Kaleman died in a car accident tonight.
translation.de: Gina Kelman starb bei einem Autounfall.

translation.en: [Meade] What?
-Her husband too. -You're kidding me.
translation.de: Ihr Mann auch. Sie machen Witze.

translation.en: Oh my God.
How long was she a patient?
[Meade] I don't know. Maybe…
…eight months?
-[Wade] What were you treating her for? -She came to me with some, uh…
translation.de: -Wofür haben Sie sie behandelt? -Sie kam zu mir wegen…

translation.en: …generalized anxiety initially.
You ever perform hypnosis on Gina?
translation.de: Machten Sie je eine Hypnose mit Gina?

translation.en: Yes. Uh, we performed our first session last week.
translation.de: Ja. Wir hatten unsere erste Sitzung letzte Woche.

translation.en: Started small, you know?
-Explored her common phobia. -Claustrophobia?
Arachnophobia.
The last claustrophobic patient I dealt with was, uh…
translation.de: Die letzte klaustrophobische Patientin, mit der ich zu tun hatte,

translation.en: Well, it was Andrea Bowen, actually.
You know what I always loved as a kid?
translation.de: Wissen Sie, was ich als Kind liebte?

translation.en: I'm sure it has something to do with why I became a detective.
translation.de: Deswegen wurde ich wohl auch Detective.

translation.en: Putting the pieces together, finding the patterns.
translation.de: Die Teile zusammensetzen, die Muster finden.

translation.en: That was always the key.
Patterns.
I looked through some of your patient files today.
translation.de: Ich sah mir heute Ihre Patientenakten an.

translation.en: The ones we obtained after Andrea's death.
translation.de: Die, die wir nach Andreas Tod bekamen.

translation.en: I got to chat with family members, and I noticed something.
translation.de: Ich sprach mit den Familien und bemerkte etwas.

translation.en: A pattern.
You don't use hypnotherapy on all of your patients.
Just a few, actually.
They share some physical characteristics,
and they also all happen to be dead.
You ever noticed that?
That pattern?
Gina Kaleman doesn't match your MO.
I think you had something else in mind when it came to her.
translation.de: aber ich glaube, Sie hatten etwas anderes im Sinn.

translation.en: Is there something specific you wanted to talk about tonight, Wade?
translation.de: Wollten Sie heute etwas Bestimmtes besprechen, Wade?

translation.en: Because if not, I should be going. It's getting late.
translation.de: Ansonsten gehe ich. Es wird spät.

translation.en: [Wade] It's Detective Rollins.
-Thanks for the booze. -[Meade] Oh, Wade.
Hypnotherapy works wonders for insomnia.
You wanna try it? I'll give you a free session.
Thought you only took female patients.
I'll make an exception.
My phone died, or I would have called.
translation.de: Kein Akku, sonst hätte ich angerufen.

translation.en: Um, I heard about your friend.
I just thought I could catch him saying something or doing something.
translation.de: Ich dachte, ich könnte ihn erwischen, wie er etwas sagt oder tut.

translation.en: He was at the station. He's been following us.
translation.de: Er war auf dem Revier. Er ist uns gefolgt.

translation.en: He's smart.
Always a step ahead.
There's a reason he never hypnotized Gina until you started asking questions.
translation.de: Es gibt einen Grund, warum er Gina nie hypnotisiert hat, bis Sie Fragen stellten.

translation.en: He knew you would go to her. She got in the way.
translation.de: Er wusste, Sie gehen zu ihr. Sie war im Weg.

translation.en: You can't blame yourself, Jenn.
And just why me?
Well, I don't know.
But not long after Andrea started asking questions, she was dead.
translation.de: Aber kurz nachdem Andrea Fragen stellte, war sie tot.

translation.en: He's not done with you yet, or you would be too.
translation.de: Er ist nicht fertig mit Ihnen, sonst wären Sie das auch.

translation.en: I got his prints. I'm gonna run 'em, see if we're missing anything.
translation.de: Ich habe seine Fingerabdrücke. Ich lasse sie überprüfen.

translation.en: I should know more tomorrow.
For now,
lay low.
[Jenn] Detective.
Thank you.
Try and get some rest.
I'll call you in the morning.
Did you forget something? Hello, Jennifer.
Jennifer, stop!
You don't need to be afraid of me. I just wanna talk.
translation.de: Du musst dich nicht vor mir fürchten. Ich will nur reden.

translation.en: What did I do to you to make you not trust me?
translation.de: Was habe ich getan, damit du mir nicht vertraust?

translation.en: [firmly] Think about it.
I invited you in. I listened.
Really, you should be thanking me.
I asked you what you wanted, and I'm working so hard to give you that.
translation.de: Ich habe dich gefragt, was du willst, und arbeite hart, dir das zu geben.

translation.en: And Brian and Gina were just gonna get in the way of your dreams.
translation.de: Und Brian und Gina wären deinen Träumen in die Quere gekommen.

translation.en: And now Rollins.
Don't worry. He'll be taken care of.
Everything I'm doing is for you, Jennifer.
translation.de: Alles, was ich tue, ist für dich, Jennifer.

translation.en: And I know there's been a lot of
translation.de: Und ich weiß, es gab viel Aufregung und Vorfreude,

translation.en: build-up and anticipation, but…
translation.de: Und ich weiß, es gab viel Aufregung und Vorfreude, aber das ist nur der Romantiker in mir.

translation.en: that's just the romantic in me.
translation.de: aber das ist nur der Romantiker in mir.

translation.en: -It's almost over. -[Jenn shudders]
[quietly] You're so close.
I'll see you soon, okay?
Oh, Jennifer… -Relax. -[Jenn gasps]
[quietly] Pick up. Pick up.
[Wade] This is Detective Wade Rollins--
Come on, come on.
[woman on TV] When the police ran his prints,
translation.de: Die Polizei deckte seine wahre Identität durch Fingerabdrücke auf.

translation.en: they discovered his real identity. He had changed his name.
translation.de: Die Polizei deckte seine wahre Identität durch Fingerabdrücke auf. Er hatte den Namen geändert.

translation.en: [man on TV] And who was he, really?
[woman] A killer. Wanted for murder in three states.
translation.de: Ein Mörder. Gesucht wegen Mordes in drei Staaten.

translation.en: -[menacing music] -[TV dialogue continues]
translation.de: Ich war schockiert, als hätte ich den Verstand verloren.

translation.en: [male narrator] Tonight, on The Crime Files.
translation.de: Heute Abend bei The Crime Files.

translation.en: In the fall of 2014,
seventeen-year-old Victoria Wilson disappeared from her suburban home
translation.de: verschwand die 17-jährige Victoria Wilson aus ihrem Vorstadthaus

translation.en: in Metuchen, New Jersey,
leaving her parents and four younger siblings
translation.de: Ihre Eltern und vier jüngere Geschwister

translation.en: heartbroken and terrified.
Three days later, her body was found in a forest 300 miles from home.
translation.de: Drei Tage später wurde ihre Leiche im Wald 500 km von zu Hause gefunden.

translation.en: So, what happened to Victoria Wilson?
translation.de: Was ist mit Victoria Wilson passiert?

translation.en: Billy Adler came home from school to find his mom dead at the dining room table,
translation.de: Billy Adler kam von der Schule nach Hause und fand seine Mutter tot am Esstisch.

translation.en: shot in the head.
The police ruled it a suicide. But Billy knew his mom would nev--
translation.de: Die Polizei sprach von Selbstmord. Aber Billy wusste, seine Mutter…

translation.en: I can't tell them I think Meade was involved.
translation.de: Ich kann nicht sagen, dass Meade beteiligt war.

translation.en: They don't know I've been digging into this.
translation.de: Sie dachten, ich hörte auf zu ermitteln.

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Rollins.
translation.de: Es tut mir so leid, Rollins.

translation.en: You read 'em?
And?
And I have an idea.
When Gina and I came to see you, you said something about
translation.de: Als Gina und ich Sie besuchten, sagten Sie,

translation.en: how police sometimes use hypnosis.
translation.de: dass die Polizei manchmal Hypnose einsetzt.

translation.en: What did you mean?
A drive-by shooter speeds away from the scene.
translation.de: Ein Schütze fährt vom Tatort weg.

translation.en: An eyewitness saw the car but can't remember the license plate.
translation.de: Ein Augenzeuge sah das Auto, erinnert sich aber nicht ans Kennzeichen.

translation.en: [clears throat] Well, maybe they do remember it.
Just not consciously.
So, we send them to a hypnotist who tries to help them recall.
translation.de: Also schicken wir ihn zum Hypnotiseur, der ihm hilft, sich zu erinnern.

translation.en: And that will hold up as evidence?
-Sometimes. -What if we did that?
What if you sent me to whoever you use for that sort of thing?
translation.de: Schicken Sie mich zu dem, den Sie für so etwas benutzen?

translation.en: And they put me under
and try to make me recall my sessions with Meade.
translation.de: erinnere ich mich an meine Sitzungen mit Meade.

translation.en: -It still may not be enough. -You just said--
I said, "Sometimes."
Do you know how hard it is to charge someone with murder and get them convicted?
translation.de: Wissen Sie, wie schwer es ist, jemanden des Mordes zu verurteilen?

translation.en: But he all but confessed to me that he's responsible for Brian and Gina.
translation.de: Aber er gestand, dass er für Brian und Gina verantwortlich ist.

translation.en: -You recorded it? -He said he was coming after--
With everything else we have, the other victims, the pattern…
translation.de: Mit allem, was wir haben… Die anderen Opfer. Das Muster.

translation.en: He's planning something. I know he is.
translation.de: Er plant etwas. Das weiß ich.

translation.en: I don't know what, but the way he was talking last night--
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, was, aber wie er gestern sprach…

translation.en: Please.
I just wanna try.
Please wake up.
[Meade] You were with Gina.
I assume she knows everything you know.
-[Jenn] Yes. -[Meade] Yes.
Well, thank you for being honest, my love.
translation.de: Danke für die Ehrlichkeit, meine Liebe.

translation.en: I'll take all of your concerns into consideration.
And then he cuts it short.
translation.de: Und dann bricht er es ab.

translation.en: How much do you really know about hypnotherapy?
translation.de: Wie viel wissen Sie wirklich über Hypnotherapie?

translation.en: [sniffles] Not much.
Well, it's an incredibly powerful tool.
When handled with care and integrity,
translation.de: Wenn sie mit Sorgfalt und Integrität gehandhabt wird,

translation.en: it can be a force for good.
But in the wrong hands, hypnosis can be dangerous.
translation.de: In den falschen Händen kann Hypnose gefährlich sein.

translation.en: What are you feeling?
[exhales deeply] I am having, um,
some trust issues with your profession right now.
translation.de: Ich habe gerade Vertrauensprobleme in Bezug auf Ihren Beruf.

translation.en: Jenn, I understand that this may not be worth much,
translation.de: Jenn, ich verstehe, dass das nicht viel wert ist,

translation.en: but you can trust me.
I'm one of the good ones.
And I'm only gonna have a look around.
translation.de: Und ich werde mich nur umsehen,

translation.en: Just see what the subconscious retained from those sessions with Dr. Meade.
translation.de: um zu sehen, was das Unterbewusstsein aus Dr. Meades Sitzungen bewahrt hat.

translation.en: [doctor] Focus on the sound of the metronome,
translation.de: Konzentrieren Sie sich auf den Klang

translation.en: keeping time.
And as you feel the weight of your body
translation.de: Und wenn Sie spüren, wie Ihr Körper

translation.en: sinking into the couch,
I want you to let everything go.
translation.de: will ich, dass Sie alles loslassen.

translation.en: Let the world around you slow down.
translation.de: Lassen Sie die Welt um sich herum langsamer werden.

translation.en: [doctor] Jenn, can you hear me?
[Jenn] Yes.
[doctor] Now, I want you to tell me everything you remember
translation.de: Ich möchte, dass Sie mir alles erzählen,

translation.en: from your sessions with Dr. Collin Meade.
translation.de: was Sie von Ihren Sitzungen mit Dr. Collin Meade wissen.

translation.en: Wake up, Jenn.
I need you to listen to the sound of my voice
translation.de: Sie müssen auf meine Stimme hören

translation.en: and come back to this room right now!
translation.de: und sofort in diesen Raum zurückkommen!

translation.en: [Meade] My mentor was a psychiatrist.
-[doctor] Wake up, Jennifer! -[Jenn screams]
What happened?
Dr. Graham, what happened?
I've never seen anything like that.
translation.de: So etwas sah ich noch nie.

translation.en: He must have planted some sort of
fail-safe or--
What's a fail-safe?
In case anybody ever tried to do what we're doing.
translation.de: Falls wer versucht, was wir versuchen.

translation.en: And I have no way of knowing
how many sustained post-hypnotic suggestions he placed.
translation.de: wie viele posthypnotische Suggestionen er platzierte.

translation.en: And these can be triggered at any given moment.
I remember something.
There was a house.
What's today's date?
It's the sixth.
-I have to go. -No, wait.
There's one more thing I could try.
Look, I can't remove all of his suggestions,
translation.de: Ich kann nicht alle Suggestionen entfernen,

translation.en: but maybe I could plant something of my own.
translation.de: aber vielleicht könnte ich etwas Eigenes einpflanzen.

translation.en: Like a counter trigger?
Exactly.
I swear to God, this is the last time I'm doing this.
translation.de: Ich schwöre bei Gott, das ist das letzte Mal.

translation.en: [Jenn] Rollins, it didn't work.
But I found out that Meade has a mentor named Xavier Sullivan.
translation.de: Aber ich fand heraus, dass Meade einen Mentor namens Xavier Sullivan hat.

translation.en: [Wade] Okay. [Jenn] Have you heard of "Project MKUltra"?
[Wade] Yeah, it was a CIA project in the '60s.
translation.de: Das war ein CIA-Projekt in den 60ern.

translation.en: [Jenn] Well, Sullivan is a hypnotist. And the CIA had recruited him
translation.de: Sullivan ist Hypnotiseur. Und die CIA hatte ihn rekrutiert,

translation.en: to use hypnosis to plant false memories in people.
I'm on my way to see him.
translation.de: Ich bin auf dem Weg zu ihm.

translation.en: [Wade] No, Jenn, that's not a good idea.
[Jenn] He might know something about Meade that can help us.
translation.de: Er könnte etwas wissen, das uns helfen kann.

translation.en: -[Wade] Just wait for me. -[Jenn] We don't have time.
[Wade] Jenn. Jenn!
[Jenn] Mr. Sullivan?
Hello?
Anybody home?
Mr. Sullivan?
[Jenn] Oh my God.
[Meade] It's uncanny, isn't it?
My wife was such a beautiful woman,
but then so are you, Jennifer.
-I don't understand. -Xavier was my father.
He left me this place when he died.
-No, just wait. -Sleep.
It's Rollins.
[man] Hey, Rollins. I ran the prints from that spoon.
translation.de: Hey, Rollins. Ich habe die Abdrücke vom Löffel.

translation.en: They belonged to a man named Julian Sullivan.
translation.de: Sie gehören einem Mann namens Julian Sullivan.

translation.en: Info's in your inbox.
[Jenn's voice] You reached Jenn Thompson. Leave a message.
translation.de: Jenn Tompson. Hinterlassen Sie eine Nachricht.

translation.en: Son of a bitch!
-[Wade] Jenn, where are you? -Rollins, it was Meade.
translation.de: -Jenn, wo sind Sie? -Rollins, es war Meade.

translation.en: -His real name is Sullivan. -Jenn, tell me where you are.
translation.de: -Sein echter Name ist Sullivan. -Jenn, wo sind Sie?

translation.en: He brought me back to his office.
translation.de: Er brachte mich in sein Büro.

translation.en: -[Wade] But where is he? -Door is locked. I don't know!
translation.de: -Wo ist er? -Die Tür ist abgeschlossen. Keine Ahnung!

translation.en: I'm sending units now. Hey, taxi! [groans]
translation.de: Ich schicke jetzt Einheiten. Hey, Taxi!

translation.en: Move! Drive!
How are you feeling?
Jennifer, take a seat.
You know…
I'll never forget that first time I saw you.
translation.de: Ich vergesse nie, wie ich dich das erste Mal sah.

translation.en: -Give me something. -[man] We've entered the building.
[Meade] You look like her,
walk like her,
you even smell like her.
There's nothing quite like a woman's scent.
translation.de: Es gibt nichts Besseres als den Duft einer Frau.

translation.en: The moment you catch it, it's just…
translation.de: Wenn man ihn riecht, ist es…

translation.en: [quietly] Just like that.
Memories.
Come on.
[agent] On the floor. Approaching suite.
translation.de: Auf der Etage. Nähern uns der Suite.

translation.en: There were a few others,
and they seemed right at first,
but ultimately,
they just weren't meant to be.
We're at the door.
What are you waiting for? Get in!
[Meade] I mean, I see why now, though.
They were close.
But you're perfect.
Move, move!
And now I have you all to myself.
translation.de: Und jetzt habe ich dich für mich.

translation.en: [squad leader] On my count.
[Meade] Jennifer.
You can wake up now.
[shakily] Where am I?
You're home.
-Sir, there's no one here. -What do you mean there's no one there?
translation.de: -Sir. Hier ist niemand. -Was soll das heißen?

translation.en: The office is empty, sir.
He wanted her to call me.
Detective Wade Rollins to dispatch.
I need a residential address to one Xavier Sullivan. -[dispatch] Copy that. -[tires screech]
[gulps] I can't move.
I know.
I'm not thrilled you started biting your nails again.
translation.de: Nicht schön, dass du wieder deine Nägel beißt.

translation.en: We'll have to work on that.
[quietly] I know this room.
I was hoping you'd recognize it.
They weren't dreams.
Oh, they were your memories with her.
translation.de: Das waren deine Erinnerungen mit ihr.

translation.en: Some of my favorites.
You put them in my head
translation.de: Du hast sie mir in den Kopf gesetzt,

translation.en: because you're trying to replace her.
The power of hypnosis.
The memory, planted in the mind,
translation.de: Die Erinnerung, eingepflanzt in den Verstand.

translation.en: given the right amount of care and attention,
translation.de: Mit der richtigen Sorgfalt und Aufmerksamkeit,

translation.en: will blossom into a whole new reality.
translation.de: wird sie zu einer neuen Realität.

translation.en: A whole new life.
Make someone believe they're somewhere they're not or,
translation.de: Sie lässt einen glauben, jemand anderes zu sein

translation.en: you know, paralyze from head to toe,
translation.de: oder von Kopf bis Fuß gelähmt.

translation.en: all with a simple suggestion.
My mentor taught me at--
translation.de: Mein Mentor brachte mir bei, in…

translation.en: -Oh my gosh, a very young age. -Your father?
Father, mentor. Interchangeable for a young boy. [chuckles]
translation.de: Nun, Vater, Mentor. Austauschbar für einen Jungen.

translation.en: You're insane.
[whispers] I am not insane.
[quietly] We want the same thing.
We share wounds.
Your loss of Brian and your son Daniel.
translation.de: Du verlorst Brian und deinen Sohn Daniel.

translation.en: My loss of Amy
and the life I thought we'd have together.
translation.de: und das Leben, das wir uns ausmalten.

translation.en: We will be that for each other.
Go like this.
-And now, for the grand finale. -[sniffles]
[quietly] Don't move.
[Meade] You don't happen to know today's date, do you?
Now you know why I waited.
translation.de: Nun weißt du, warum ich wartete.

translation.en: Our anniversary.
I told you,
I'm a romantic. [laughs]
[softly] And there she is.
My beautiful bride.
You're perfect.
-[Jenn gasps] No. -Jennifer, don't let go.
[screams] Rollins!
[Wade] Jenn!
Rollins! Rollins, I'm in here.
-Where is he? -He went out the back.
-I'm trapped. You have to help me. -[Wade] The door is locked.
Jenn, listen to me.
I have to go find him. You're gonna be okay.
translation.de: Ich muss ihn finden. Alles wird gut.

translation.en: What? No, no, no! Rollins, no!
Please don't go! You can't go! Please don't go!
translation.de: Bitte gehen Sie nicht. Das können Sie nicht.

translation.en: [panting] Okay. Come on. Just focus. Focus.
I'm okay. I'm okay. [panting]
[Jenn] Rollins!
[Wade] Jenn, the gun!
[Meade] Jennifer, sleep!
[Wade] Jenn? Jenn?
It's Rollins. Wake up, Jenn.
translation.de: Hier ist Rollins. Wachen Sie auf, Jenn.

translation.en: -[Jenn gasps] -That's it, wake up. That's it. No.
-You're okay. -No.
-Where is he? Where is he? -He's gone.
-It's over. You're okay. -[Jenn panting]
I called in for backup. They'll be here shortly.
You're okay.
You're…
You're a good shot.
-Oh, sorry. -It's okay.
-Here. -Thank you.
[groans] Here. Here.
You're gonna be fine.
I promise, my love.
[doctor] Jenn.
In the recording you played me,
Dr. Meade called you "my love."
[Meade] Thank you for being honest, my love.
translation.de: Danke für die Ehrlichkeit, meine Liebe.

translation.en: If you are ever under a post-hypnotic suggestion
translation.de: Wenn Sie jemals unter einer posthypnotischen Suggestion

translation.en: by Dr. Collin Meade, and he refers to you as "my love,"
translation.de: von Dr. Collin Meade stehen, und er Sie als "meine Liebe" bezeichnet,

translation.en: you will ignore
every single trigger he put into your head.
translation.de: jeden einzelnen Auslöser, den er in Ihren Kopf setzte.

translation.en: And you will see the world around you
translation.de: Und Sie werden die Welt um Sie herum sehen,

translation.en: for what it truly is.
-I'm not your love. -[groans]
-[Jenn] No! -No, no, no.
[whispering] Rollins.
Oh my God! Oh God.
Hey, hey! Wake up. Please wake up.
translation.de: Hey, aufwachen. Bitte wachen Sie auf.

translation.en: -Come on. -[weakly] Ankle.
What?
[Wade] Ankle.
[Meade] Come here!
Hey. No, no, no! Hey, hey, hey! Hi.
Right here. Look at me, look at me. Look at me, look at me. Yes.
translation.de: Ich bin hier! Schauen Sie mich an.

translation.en: Hi, hi! You're okay, you're okay.
-[weakly] You shot me. -[Jenn] I'm sorry.
Stay-- Yeah. Stay with me. Hi. You're okay. You're gonna be okay.
translation.de: Bleiben Sie… Ja. Bleiben Sie bei mir. Hi. Alles ok. Alles wird gut.

translation.en: -[whispering] Stay with me, okay? -[sirens wailing]
translation.de: Bleiben Sie einfach bei mir, ok? Genau so.

translation.en: [Jenn] I can hear them. I hear sirens. They are coming. It's okay.
translation.de: Ich kann sie hören. Ich höre sie. Ich höre Sirenen. Sie kommen. Alles ok.

translation.en: You're gonna be okay. You're gonna be okay.
I think it's great. We present it to the team at Monday's meeting.
translation.de: Es ist toll. Wir präsentieren es dem Team am Montag,

translation.en: But I'm a huge fan.
translation.de: aber ich bin ein großer Fan.

translation.en: Uh-huh. Great work, Tiff.
Yeah, I'll see you then.
I'm definitely moving. [chuckles]
You'll like the new place. You don't have to. I understand.
translation.de: Das neue Haus wird dir gefallen. Muss es aber nicht.

translation.en: I know you're very particular about your things.
translation.de: Ich weiß, du bist sehr wählerisch.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I'm sorry I left.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, dass ich ging.

translation.en: I'm sorry I didn't share my grief with you.
translation.de: Dass ich meine Trauer nicht mit dir teilte.

translation.en: I'm sorry that I thought losing Daniel
translation.de: Tut mir leid, dass ich dachte, Daniel zu verlieren,

translation.en: was harder for me than it was for you.
translation.de: war schwerer für mich als für dich.

translation.en: And I know it's not my fault what happened to him.
translation.de: Es ist nicht meine Schuld, was ihm passierte.

translation.en: No matter how much I wanna blame myself.
translation.de: Egal, wie sehr ich mir Vorwürfe machen will.

translation.en: But it is my fault what happened to us.
translation.de: Aber es ist meine Schuld, was uns passiert ist.

translation.en: And for that, I'm really, truly sorry.
translation.de: Und das tut mir wirklich leid.

translation.en: The doctors say your tests are promising. That's really good news.
translation.de: Die Ärzte sagen, deine Tests sind vielversprechend. Das ist echt gut.

translation.en: And when you wake up, I'll be sitting right here.
translation.de: Wenn du aufwachst, sitze ich hier.

translation.en: -My condolences on your promotion. -[chuckles]
I'm regretting it already.
I left you alone, but I did wanna say thank you
translation.de: Ich ließ Sie in Ruhe, aber ich wollte Ihnen

translation.en: for everything.
I wasn't sure when I'd see you again, but…
translation.de: Ich wusste nicht, wann ich Sie wiedersehe, aber…

translation.en: I figured you'd come around eventually.
translation.de: Ich dachte schon, Sie kämen vorbei.

translation.en: A token of my appreciation.
Take care of yourself, yeah?
Well played.
